title: Rudy Gonzalez Christian Reformed Race Relations
description:
I've worked with Rudy on a few things over the years. He's watched my activity on Twitter and wanted to know if I wanted to have a conversation with some big name on race relations. I told him I'd rather talk to him so here's our conversation.
